title: ArmaTrenddon 10/20: Liz Truss, Netflix, McDonald's, 'Creed 3', JWST, Avogeddon
itunes:title: ArmaTrenddon 10/20: Liz Truss, Netflix, McDonald's, 'Creed 3', JWST, Avogeddon
description:
In this edition of ArmaTrendon, Jack and Miles discuss UK PM Liz Truss stepping down, Netflix preparing to crack down on striminals, McDonald's bringing back the Happy Meal Halloween Pail, the 'Creed 3' trailer, new JWST images of the Pillars of Creation, and Avogeddon in Philly!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
